headline: KURODA PRECISION INDUSTRIES SUPER POLISHING MACHINE
categories.lvl2: Surface Processing Equipment  >  Lapping Machines > Single Sided Lapper
specstable:
Manufacturer Kuroda Precision Ind
Model KRP 2200F
Description Super Polishing Machine
Accessories Slurry recovery system
Other Information General Specifications:
Table diameter: 300mm
Max. workpiece size: 400mm dia x 200mm H
Table revolution speed: 0.5-6 rpm
Z Axis stroke: 100mm
X Axis Specifications:
  • Stroke: 400mm
  • Feed rate: 0.1-3m/min
  • Resolution: 0.001mm
    Y Axis Specifications:
  • Stroke: 400mm
  • Feed rate: 0.1-3m/min
  • Resolution: 0.001mm
    Polishing Head Specifications:
  • Vertical stroke: 50mm
  • Speed: 50-200 rpm
  • Polishing load: 0.5-5 kgf
    Control Specifications:
  • FANUC 180i-M
  • Two axes with NC, X and Y
Power Requirements 200-208 V 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Year of Manufacture 2000
Exterior Dimensions
Width 55.000 in (139.7 cm)
Depth 43.000 in (109.2 cm)
Height 70.000 in (177.8 cm)
Weight 2,646 lb (1,200 kg)
